ygData.subject: Re: Accelerando update
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed it prepatch, too.  But agree that it wasn t much of an issue. Can t say for certain if I was encumbered or not.  :) Darkfox Reven tsol Xegony ...
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed it prepatch, too. But agree that it wasn't much of an issue.
Can't say for certain if I was encumbered or not. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony

> I noticed it quite some time ago - but for the most part - it was a low
> enough amount that it never really became much of an issue. I haven't
been
> watching closely if it got worse with the last patch.
>
> Slyde

> >
> > I hate to say this.. I mean I REALLY hate to say this.
> >
> > Has anyone noticed that stamina is now draining from us while running
with
> > Accelerando? I was just running through SK and found my stamina bar
> rapidly
> > decreasing.. I have never seen that except when running and jumping, or
> when
> > out of food/water. Can anyone tell me if I am alone in this or did they
> > nerf Accel while "extending it's range"
> >
>
